item.description:
Okay, all... the owner was very cool this time. As long as people buy *some* thing (even if it's just a drink and an appetizer), this place is ours for as long as we want to meet here. I do want to reiterate, though:

The monthlies are SOCIAL events. Although we do talk business at them for maybe half an hour and sometimes play evidence clips, these things are so y'all can hear first hand what we do, ask questions, tell your own stories, etc. They're so we can all have a little no-pressure time together, and it kinda helps us all by reminding each other that this stuff *isn't* just TV and book fodder, but real events happening to real people - like us.

As always, Asia ha a decent buffet going til 8:00 - $12 per person.

See y'all there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the person who resembles my profile image, but ask at the entry anyhow!
item.name: The Seacoast Paranormal Research Group January Meetup
